StringTable.Label: GAMETAG_SYNTAX_WITH_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Some tags are simply the name of the tag in {}.[BR]Syntax: {GAMETAG} [BR]Example: "{PLANETNAME} is a great place to live!"[BR]Others have a : followed by a number which is the GameTextIndex, to differentiate between multiple possible replacements.[BR]In conversation flavor text, 1 is the Speaker (player initiating the conversation), 2 is the Listener (player receiving the conversation) and 3 is the Third Party Player (player the Speaker and Listener are conversing about).[BR]In conversations where something is being offered, use the GameTextIndex to indicate who is giving the item (AMOUNT, TECHNAME, OBJECTNAME)[BR]Syntax: {GAMETAG:#} [BR]Example 1: "We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} declare war on you, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}"[BR]Example 2: "The {PLAYERFACTION:3} are no more."
